original_text: This is the purpose that is purposed upon the whole earth: and this is the hand that is stretched out upon all the nations.
korean_text: 이것이 온 세계를 향하여 정한 경영이며 이것이 열방을 향하여 편 손이라 하셨나니

sentences.original_text: that is purposed upon the whole earth
that is stretched out upon all the nations
